snippet: Mental illness and a culture that prefers boys have been discussed as possible explanations after a woman killed her daughters.
abstract: Letter from India; case of Radha Devi, New Delhi mother who strangled her three daughters and then unsuccessfully tried to hang herself, has transfixed India as people speculate about her possible motivation and implications of the crime; investigation has revealed that Devi was under psychiatric treatment, but culture that values boys over girls has also been suggested as contributing factor.
lead_paragraph: Mental illness and a culture that prefers boys have been discussed as possible explanations after a woman killed her daughters.

headline.main: Puzzlement Over Killing of 3 Girls in Delhi
